attributes.action: stop sending jobseekers, who are already on courses to improve their employability, to short term full time employment or compulsory New Deal courses  compelling them to give up the courses in which they are already participating
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This practice wastes public money as the investment  made in the educational programme already started by the jobseeker will bring no returns as jobseeker is taken off the course and the jobseeker is thereby condemned to even longer period of claiming JSA or returning to unemployment after only short period of employment.
